name: To Infinitea and Beyond
description:
As you start your first day on the job at Infinitea, prepare to uncover a slightly underwhelming secret. Yes, work sucks... but sometimes it's fun to get involved in workplace drama, isn't it? So get to know your four new co-workers! Enjoy the meaningless strife that is the food service industry without shame! And if you happen to know the real-life people who inspired me to make this... no you don't!

  • No content warnings
  • 1-5 minute playtime
  • Just a silly little project to practice making dialogue in Ren'py!

** ARTIST CREDIT **

None of this game's art was made by me. Background art is from Ellis Kim, character art is from Jay Ivee, and royalty-free music is from Kevin Macleod.

Ellis Kim: https://elliskim.artstation.com/projects/26XWv

Jay Ivee: https://jayivee.carrd.co/

Kevin Macleod: https://incompetech.com/music/royalty-free/faq.html
